item.title: Gotta catch 'em all
item.description: Great packages have great test suites. Packages with C++ are not exceptions. You might be surprised to find how easy it is to add C++ unittests to your package. This post will focus on testthat’s Catch integration. There are plenty of C++ testing frameworks, each with their own pros and cons. The benefit of this approach is the really low setup cost and no dependency management. Set up The first step is to add some boilerplate to your package.
